title: Beat the Dow Jones With This Unstoppable Dividend Stock
text: This pharmaceutical stock combines strong financials with an above-average dividend.

title: Merck Nears Breakout Point After October Surprise Good News
text: Dow component Merck is within 2% of an all-time high after rallying 7.30% in the past month. It got a boost from news about two new treatments.

title: Moderna CEO: Merck deal GÇÿcould be a game changer' for cancer treatment
text: Moderna CEO St+¬phane Bancel spoke with Anjalee Khemlani at Yahoo Finance's All Markets Summit about the company's deal with Merck to develop a cancer vaccine.

title: Dow Jones Leader Merck Breaks Out; 3 Other Top Stocks To Watch
text: Dow Jones leader Merck is breaking out past a buy point while other top stocks to watch include AutoZone, Cardinal and Molina Healthcare. The post Dow Jones Leader Merck Breaks Out; 3 Other Top Stocks To Watch appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

title: Merck And Moderna Move Forward With Melanoma Vaccine - There's A Case For Backing Both
text: Back in September 2021,Moderna's and Merck's market cap valuation were only a few billions apart at ~$175bn and ~$182bn, respectively. As the more diversified, future-proofed pharma, it makes sense that Merck's valuation has increased while Moderna's has tanked.
